title: Real-Time Online Speaking Proficiency Improvement Program for Secondary English Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in secondary-level English grammar and reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented design for strengthening in-service teachers' practical application abilities, utilizing interactive learning environments with digital devices

learning_goals: Achieve speaking proficiency to explain content in natural English pronunciation and intonation for over 10 minutes in real-time online classes.
Demonstrate the application of five or more interactive teaching methods to induce student engagement in classroom settings.
Design a learner-customized feedback system and develop an actionable model during project-based assessment processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
